headline: Does New AI-Focused Colocation Momentum Change The Bull Case For Equinix (EQIX)?
summary: In recent weeks, analysts at Bank of America Securities and Deutsche Bank reinforced their positive views on Equinix, emphasizing its enterprise colocation leadership and role in AI-related digital infrastructure, while Options Technology deployed a new liquid-cooled high-density cage in Equinix's NY5 data center. Together, this upbeat research and advanced customer deployment underscore how Equinix’s interconnected data center ecosystem is increasingly aligned with AI and high-performance...
